panels.title: graphql_queries SLI Apdex

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.

targets.legendFormat: {{ region }} RPS

panels.title: graphql_queries SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

The number of GraphQL queries meeting their duration target based on the urgency
of the endpoint. By default, a query should take no more than 1s. We're working
on making the urgency customizable in [this epic](https://gitlab.com/groups/gitlab-org/-/epics/5841).

Mutliple queries could be batched inside a single request.

panels.title: loadbalancer SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Measures aggregated HTTP request traffic through the HAProxy.
5xx responses are considered to be failures.



### Observability Tools

* [BigQuery: Main-stage: top paths for 5xx errors](https://console.cloud.google.com/bigquery?project=gitlab-production&sq=805818759045:342973e81d4a481d8055b43564d09728)

panels.title: puma SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

This SLI monitors API traffic in aggregate, in the GitLab rails monolith, via its
HTTP interface. 5xx responses are treated as failures.



### Observability Tools

* [ðŸž Sentry Releases: gitlab/gitlabcom](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlabcom/releases?environment=${environment})
* [ðŸž Sentry api issues](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlabcom/issues?environment=${environment}&query=stage%3A${stage}+type%3Aapi)
* [ðŸ“– Kibana: Rails logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.status,json.method,json.meta.caller_id,json.meta.feature_category,json.path,json.request_urgency,json.duration_s,json.target_duration_s),filters:!((meta:(key:json.subcomponent,negate:!t,params:graphql_json,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.subcomponent:(query:graphql_json,type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.type,params:api,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:api,type:phrase))))),index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

panels.title: rails_requests SLI Apdex

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.

targets.legendFormat: {{ region }} RPS

panels.title: rails_requests SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

The number of requests meeting their duration target based on the urgency
of the endpoint. By default, a request should take no more than 1s. But
this can be adjusted by endpoint.

Read more about this in the [documentation](https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/development/application_slis/rails_request_apdex.html).



### Observability Tools

targets.legendFormat: {{ region }} RPS

panels.title: workhorse SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Aggregation of most web requests that pass through workhorse, monitored via the HTTP interface.
Excludes health, readiness and liveness requests. Some known slow requests, such as HTTP uploads,
are excluded from the apdex score.



### Observability Tools

* [Google Stackdriver Continuous Profiling](https://console.cloud.google.com/profiler;timespan=4h/workhorse-api;type=CPU/cpu?project=gitlab-production)
* [ðŸž Sentry Releases: gitlab/gitlab-workhorse-gitlabcom](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlab-workhorse-gitlabcom/releases?environment=${environment})
* [ðŸž Sentry issues](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlab-workhorse-gitlabcom/issues?environment=${environment})
* [ðŸ“– Kibana: Workhorse logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.remote_ip,json.status,json.uri,json.duration_ms),filters:!((meta:(key:json.type.keyword,params:api,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:api,type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.type,params:api,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:api,type:phrase))))),index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [ðŸ“– Kibana: Workhorse slow request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.remote_ip,json.status,json.uri,json.duration_ms),filters:!((meta:(key:json.type.keyword,params:api,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:api,type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.type,params:api,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:api,type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.duration_ms,params:(gte:10000),type:range),query:(range:(json.duration_ms:(gte:10000))))),index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',sort:!(!(json.duration_ms,desc)))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
